title: message to FFG 'make more of these multi-choice quests please

comments.content: ive just started playing flight from moria......man that quests fun, i love the different 2b cards- great idea, so yeah...if you're reading this ffg, more of this please
what was interesting is that this idea was first seen at BGG in a free custom quest, it had 10 or 11 quest cards were you had to work your way though a maze with left and right turns... very cool.
Haven't had the chance to play the Moria quests yet, but this looks like a very good quest system. I wholeheartedly agree that FFG should do a few more of these.Â
